title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.44 - Form of hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.44 - Form of hearing

State Regulations
(a) Hearings before the Board will be conducted in person or by
video-teleconference, as determined by the Board. (b) A party may request that the hearing be
held in a different form than determined by the Board but must do so, in
writing, with all parties copied, setting forth the reason(s) a party, representative or witness must appear in person or by
video-teleconference. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
65.44

Adopted

New

York State Register March 30, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 13, eff. 3/30/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
